items.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise
items.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available...

items.title: For Ukrainians, a nuclear missile museum is a bitter reminder of what the country gave up

items.title: Zelenskyy to meet with Trump as efforts to end Russia-Ukraine war remain elusive

items.title: Jeffrey R. Holland, next in line to lead Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, dies at 85
items.description: Jeffrey R. Holland led the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, a key governing body. He was next in line to become the church's president.
